function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of personal protective measures","Impact":"Increased risk of mosquito-borne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Promoting and encouraging the use of personal protective measures","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, distribution of protective gear","People":"Individuals in affected areas","Owner":"Public health officials"},{"Description":"Ineffective public health messaging","Impact":"Inadequate adoption of personal protective measures","Mitigation":"Tailoring messaging to address concerns and increase adoption","Technologies":"Targeted messaging, community engagement","People":"Population at risk of mosquito-borne diseases","Owner":"Public health officials"}]}
